description.value:
At 14th level, you gain the ability to infect a humanoid's mind with the alien magic of your patron. You can use your action to touch an incapacitated humanoid. That creature is then charmed by you until a @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.XZhdgVK3cLoxNCQl]{Remove Curse} spell is cast on it or the charmed condition is removed from it. While charmed in this way, the creature obeys your commands as in the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.zMAWdyc8UVb37BK4]{Suggestion} spell.

You can communicate telepathically with the charmed creature as long as the two of you are on the same plane of existence.

When you create a new thrall, each of your existing thralls make a Charisma saving throw against your spell save DC. On a successful save, the creature breaks free of the charm in 1d100 minutes.
